remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> pode converter os seguintes tipos para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
- <xref:System.String>
- <xref:System.Decimal>
- <xref:System.Single>
- <xref:System.Double>
- <xref:System.Int16>
- <xref:System.Int32>
- <xref:System.Int64>
- <xref:System.UInt16>
- <xref:System.UInt32>
- <xref:System.UInt64>

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> retorn `true` se `destinationType` é <xref:System.String> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>. Caso contrário, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> retorna `false`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> pode converter os seguintes tipos para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
- <xref:System.String>
- <xref:System.Decimal>
- <xref:System.Single>
- <xref:System.Double>
- <xref:System.Int16>
- <xref:System.Int32>
- <xref:System.Int64>
- <xref:System.UInt16>
- <xref:System.UInt32>
- <xref:System.UInt64>
Chame o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> método antes de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> para evitar gerar uma exceção.
